knimeNode.name: JSON Input
knimeNode.shortDescription: Specify a text in the dialog and return it as a JSON value.

fullDescription.intro: This nodes allows injecting a JSON value from outside, e.g. via the advanced batch executor or server-exposed workflow, into the workflow. The JSON value is returned as a single JSON cell in the column json.
fullDescription.option: The text representing a default JSON value. It might contain comments between /* */ or after # or // until the end of line.

ports.outPort: Table containing a single JSON value in the column json.
